actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-1249.

official_title: A bill entitled "The Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1983".
short_title: Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1983

summary.text: Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1983 - Grants an antitrust exemption to health care insurers for the purposes of: (1) acquiring data on health care costs and services; and (2) entering into service and cost agreements with health care providers. Authorizes the Attorney General to investigate such joint activities to determine whether they conform to this Act.

titles.title: Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1983
A bill entitled "The Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1983".
